description.value:
Whenever wearer inflicts Righteous Fury against a vehicle, add +1 to the roll on the Critical Hit Table Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks like a Red Ceramite Medallion emblazoned with gold filigree.

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Destroy a Chaos Engine of War.

Effect: Special

Notes: -

Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks like a Red Ceramite Medallion emblazoned with gold
